name: places/ChIJXXI8n4xYwokRCLNuie7mhVQ
formattedAddress: 101 Central Park W Suite 1b, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 101 Central Park W Suite 1b, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I made an appointment in august, first available was today, october 9. I called a few hours in advance to make sure that my insurance company would cover the injections for pain that I was scheduled for. Well, the front desk told me I was on a "wait list" as there had not been approval from my insurance company. I was angry so I called the insurance company to find that they could not possibly approve what had not been submitted. Dr Starkman's office had 2 months to submit the paperwork but did not. They also did not call to tell me not to come in. They communicated nothing. Not with the insurance company and not with me. I waited 2 months in pain for relief and got nothing. Certainly no respect for my time or discomfort, and no communication of any kind. I have worked with the public in customer service most of my (long) life, and this is terrible customer service any way you look at it. Forewarned is forearmed. Good luck.

originalText.text: The best neurologist there is. Takes time with his patients, I never felt rushed. He has a great attention to detail. The staff in the upper west side office is incredible. Very helpful and nice. Highly recommend!!!

text.text: The best neurologist there is. Takes time with his patients, I never felt rushed. He has a great attention to detail. The staff in the upper west side office is incredible. Very helpful and nice. Highly recommend!!!

originalText.text:
When you leave Dr. Starkman’s office,
You feel results, not empty promise,
He changed the “quality of life”,
Not only mine, my friends, my wife,
He diagnosed, he tamed the pain,
While many others try in vain.
IF
